messages.content: TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
An explosion inside a bus killed six people and injured another ten in down town Damascus.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
A bomb blast in Aleppo kills six people and injures 32, Syrian state TV reports. Salah al-Din is located west of Aleppos Old City in a district that was part of the last rebel enclave.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights said the clashes pitted the Saudi-backed rebel faction Jaish al-Islam (Army of Islam) against Fateh al-Sham Al-Qaedas former branch in Syria.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

US-backed Syrian fighters are pushing ahead in their offensive in northern Syria against members of the Islamic State group. The fighting between Kurdish-led Syrian Democratic Forces and IS members left at least 11 extremists dead.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The strike on the village of Urum al-Joz was suspected to have been carried out by Russian planes. The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights monitor said the strike killed 15 civilians including four children.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
UN Security Council meets to debate a Western-drafted resolution condemning the air strike. Moscow which holds a veto defended its Damascus ally saying chemicals were part of a "terrorist" stockpile.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Eleven children killed in a barrel bomb attack on a rebel-held neighbourhood of Syrias Aleppo city a monitor said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
At least 15 civilians were killed in a barrel bomb attack on a rebel-held district of Syrias Aleppo city on Saturday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights said three strikes targeted the main road and centre of the town. It was unclear if Syrian regime warplanes or aircraft of its Russian allies carried out the attack.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Britain-based Syrian Observatory for Human Rights said that the toll could rise.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The car blew up on the western edge of the town of Qamishli near the Turkish border. No one immediately claimed responsibility for the attack but the Islamic State group has carried out several bombings in Kurdish areas in Syria in the past.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Britain-based Syrian Observatory for Human Rights said 38 members of government forces were killed in the blast on Thursday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Coalition raids kill 21 civilians in IS stronghold in Syria. At least 15 civilians were killed in raids in a northern district of Manbij. The militant bastion has faced a month-long US-backed offensive.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Eleven civilians including four children were killed by air raids after midnight.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Turkish army howitzers fired on the militants as they were preparing to open fire on Turkey. Ten IS group targets were hit in the strikes.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Motorbike bomber kills 16 outside bakery in Syrias Hasakeh. 15 of the wounded are in critical condition.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights said the "container bombs" used in the attacks on Al-Bab were three times bigger than crudely constructed barrel bombs.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights said 19 explosions were heard during the air strikes in al-Shadadi in the northeastern province of Hasaka on Thursday. The US-led alliance started bombing Islamic State targets in Syria in September.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Syrian army kills 62 rebels east of Damascus. Monitoring group Syrias state news agency did not give a death toll for the ambsuh.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Syria regime bombing kills 21 including 8 children. More than 180000 people have been killed in Syria since an uprising against President Bashar al-Assads regime began.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
US-led strikes on the northern Syrian province of Raqa killed more than 20 jihadists in two positions alone early Tuesday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
At least 50 jihadists from the Islamic State and Al-Nusra Front were killed overnight by Syrian troops backed by Lebanese Hezbollah fighters near the Lebanese border.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
At least 65 bodies of civilians have been found in a central town retaken by government forces from the Islamic State group. Most of the victims are believed to have been killed by IS.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
US-led coalition air strike kills 18 civilians in Syrias Raqa.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Among the dead were seven people killed as they queued to buy yoghurt at a market in the Bustan al-Qasr neighbourhood.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Nusra Front broke allegiance with al Qaeda and changed its name to Jabhat Fateh al-Sham in July.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
At least 20 Syrian rebels were killed in a blast at a border crossing with Turkey on Thursday. Around 20 people had also been wounded.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
At least 10 Syrian soldiers killed in Israeli raids NGO says. Arab Israeli teenage son of defence ministry contractor killed on the Golan.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Syrian regime helicopters dropped barrel bombs on an opposition-held district in northern Aleppo city killing at least 20 people.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The fighting flared up in eastern Deir el-Zour province on Sunday and continued into Monday. It pitted al-Qaidas affiliate the Nusra Front against the al-Qaida breakaway Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Mortar fire in Damascus kills 12 wounds 50 State media. Two shells hit a technical institute.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
At least 21 dead in rebel fire on regime parts of Aleppo NGO says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S.-led Coalition air raids on ISIL positions near Kobaninorth Syria reportedly killed 35 fighters. ISIL facilities and vehicles also hit in Hasakeh to the north east of Syrias countryside.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Airstrike on a hospital in northwestern Syria on Saturday killed 10 people including children. Syrian regime and allied Russian military planes operate in Syria but it is not known which aircraft carried out the strike.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russian warplanes continue to indiscriminately target opposition controlled hospitals marketplaces and civilian areas. Syria has been locked in a vicious civil war since early 2011 when the Assad regime cracked down on pro-democracy protests.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

At least 10 people including women and children have been killed in barrel bomb attacks dropped by regime warplanes. The opposition also stated that people in the opposition-controlled areas are fleeing after Assad regimes random attacks.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The missiles fired from a Syrian warplane also wounded 25 others. Syria has been locked in a vicious civil war since early 2011. More than a quarter of a million people have been killed.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

14 Daesh terrorists were killed in northern Syria during an operation by Turkish Armed Forces and the U.S.-led coalition. Turkish towns and provinces have been repeatedly struck by fire from across the border since mid-January.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Russian fighter jets strike an opposition-held neighborhood in western Syria. At least 11 people killed and 25 others injured.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A suicide bomber killed 30 people injured 90 on Monday in an attack targeting a wedding party in the northeastern Syrian province of Hasakeh. Witnesses initially said the groom was among the dead but one of his relatives told AFP that both bride and groom were safe and well.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights does not know whether Syrian regime or Russian warplanes carried out the strikes. A US-Russian brokered truce in force since Monday does not include areas where Daesh is present.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Government forces clashed with terrorists from the Islamic State (IS) terrorist organization. Among killed militants is IS military emissary Abu Turab who commanded formations in central Syria.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
A total of 1500 people have fallen victims of the chemical attack in Syria member of the Kurdish National Council says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
8 persons killed 58 others injured in terrorist rocket attacks on Aleppo city. Most of them are children and women.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Ten civilians some of them children killed in airstrike by US-led coalition in Raqqa. Three workers, an entire family of six displaced people who were residing the village some of whom were children.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

10 civilians killed 15 injured in terrorist rocket attacks on Aleppo and Deir Ezzor 6 September 2016 SANA reporter in Aleppo said that 6 civilians including a woman and two children were killed and 12 other civilians were injured by rocket shells fired by terrorist groups on al-Athamiyeh neighborhood in Aleppo city on Tuesday. Meanwhile four civilians were killed when ISIS targeted residential neighborhoods in DeirEzzor with rocket shells.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Terrorists from Jaish al-Fateh fired rocket shells on residential areas in Aleppo. Two people were killed and eight others were injured.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
35 cases of suffocation in terrorist chemical attack on al-Hamadaniyeh area in Aleppo city.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Terrorists fired a rocket shell which fell near the Public Park in al-Aziziyeh neighborhood killing one civilian and injuring many others. A day ago a 5-year-old child was killed and six other civilians including three children (5-8 years) were injured as a result of terrorist mortar attack which hit Jaramana city.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Syrian army killed 11 terrorists in an attack on their positions in Deir Ezzor SANA news agency reported on Tuesday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Terrorist organizations fired tens of shells on the residential neighborhoods in Aleppo city claiming the lives of 8 persons and injuring more than 58 others. Most of them are children and women.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Three people killed and five injured in terrorist rocket attack in Aleppo. On Sunday more than 35 people suffered suffocation.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Six civilians were killed among them 4 children and a woman while eight persons were injured in terrorist attacks with rocket shells on al-Hizam al-Akhdar.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
ISIL killed 15 civilians and 27 popular fighters in the attack. Another 10 bodies yet to be identified as fighters or local residents.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Syrian Coalition condemns the massacre committed by ISIS militants against elements of the FSA in the town of Al Bab northeast of Aleppo. Activists said that around 41 FSA rebels were rounded up and executed by the extremist group in the first day of Eid al-Fitr.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Russian forces kill 120 ISIS fighters over 60 foreign mercenaries in Syria. A command post of the terrorists and up to 80 fighters including nine natives of the Northern Caucasus were destroyed.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
One civilian was killed while 16 others were injured in terrorist rocket attacks on many neighborhoods in Aleppo.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Syrian National said that the Assad regime still exploits the international anti-ISIS campaign to commit more massacres against the Syrian people. The Syrian Coalition stresses that these criminal acts requires taking concrete measures by the international community to protect the unarmed civilians.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Two women were killed and 16 other people were injured as the terrorist organizations fired rocket shells on al-Sayyed Ali neighborhood in the city.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Girl child killed and two others injured in terrorist rocket attack on neighborhood in Aleppo city.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
An ammunition depot explosion in an area in the western Syrian city of Homs has claimed the lives of at least 40 people.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
8 civilians were killed of which some was child and more than 80 were injured. The neighborhoods targeted today were predominantly Assyrian.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Militants based in the eastern part of Aleppo shelled residential area of Sulaymaniyah in the western part of the city state news agency SANA reported. Some of the injured are in a serious condition.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Three people were killed and scores were injured on Wednesday due to terrorist attacks with rocket shells and explosive rounds on neighborhoods.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The US Air Force bombed heavily two residential areas in the war-hit town of Manbij leaving 43 civilians dead and many more wounded. The US warplanes for the fourth time in their so-called anti-terrorism operations targeted al-Haal market al-Sinaah district and the only bakery of the town.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Syrian armed forces have killed over 200 terrorists in Southwestern Aleppo. Syrian army have repelled 7 waves of powerful terrorist attacks in the Southwestern parts of Aleppo in the last 10 days killing over 2200 militants.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A Russian air strike killed 49 Nusra Front militants including seven of its field commanders in Syrias Idlib province. Russia said on Wednesday it had critically injured a leader of the Tahrir al-Sham militant group Abu Mohamad al-Golani.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A double terrorist attack in the western Syrian city of Homs has claimed the lives of 18 civilians including 10 children. According to earlier media reports two car bombs went off near the Akrameh al-Makhzumi school and the Zaim hospital.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

An explosion occurred not far from central Damascus local media reported Monday. Sputnik correspondent revealed that 15 people died including five policemen. No extremist group has taken responsibility for the attack so far.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
A shelling of the central neighborhoods of Damascus left six people dead and more than 10 wounded. Two shells exploded in the Shaalan district in the city center.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Syrian army killed 28 and wounded 30 Daesh terror group militants in Deir ez-Zor city and its surroundings local media reported citing a military source.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Airstrike of the US-led anti-terror coalition has claimed lives of eight civilians in the Syrian city of Al-Tabqah west of Raqqa. Other media reports suggest that at least 14 people we killed by the airstrike.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Over 100 militants were killed in clashes between Faylaq al-Rahman Jaysh al-Islam and Jabhat Fatah al Sham (banned in Russia) in the Damascus suburbs. According to the Al Mayadeen broadcaster the clashes are still underway.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The number of civilians killed by the US-led coalition airstrike in the Syrian northern province of Raqqa has risen to 20 with children among the casualties media reported Saturday. Earlier in the day Syrian SANA news agency reported about ten casualties.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The car bomb in the suburbs Siouf square also wounded 56 people the broadcaster said. It said children were among the dead. The explosion struck at around 715 pm (1615 GMT)
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A car bomb killed at least 70 people and left more than a hundred other wounded on Friday in the town of Rankus north of Damascus countryside. UK-opposition Syrian Observatory said "tens" of people were injured.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
ISIL has threatened to kill more FSA members and commanders after they rejected to express allegiance to the terrorist group.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Fierce clashes have erupted between Nusra Front as well as the so-called Free Syria Army (FSA) on one hand and ISIL on the other on Qalamoun barrens. Security sources told Al-Manar that the clashes which have reached the barrens of the town of Qara.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Syrian army clashed fiercely with ISIL terrorists in the vicinity of Deir Ezour military airport killing or injuring scores of them. The Syrian military continued its anti-terrorism operations in different areas across the country inflicting heavy losses.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Kurdish forces killed at least 16 ISIL terrorists in an attack on Saturday in northeast Syria near the border with Turkey. The assault targeted ISIL positions south of the town of Ras al-Ain in Hasakeh province.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Syrian army killed a terrorist commander as well as five of his entourage as they were trying infiltrate towards Filita in Qalamoun in Damascus countryside. The Syrian army also advanced in Huweijet al -Sakr in Deior Ezour killing and injuring scores of terrorists.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

About 150 Iraqi fighters crossed the border from Turkey late Friday to join fellow Kurds trying to repel the ISIL group. Fierce clashes in and around KobanI have killed about 100 IS fighters in the past three days.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Syrian army ambushed Friday a group of terrorists on Flita barrens in Qalamoun killing 15 and injuring dozens of them. The Syrian military also operated against the militant groups across the country inflicting heavy losses upon them.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Syrian army Thursday ambushed and killed 140 ISIL terrorists in the vicinity of Tabaqa military airport in Raqqa countryside.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Syrian warplanes targeted ISIL strongholds in Raqqa province killing 31 terrorists including commanders. The Syrian army foiled militant infiltration attempts and targeted the terrorists gatherings across the country.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The opposition UK-based Syrian Observatory reported that the Islamic State in Iraq and the Levant executed at least 19 men at an oil field. The Observatory added that ISIL executed the 19 men on charges of "corruption on earth"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The bus was transporting Lebanese pilgrims from the shrine of Sayyeda Ruqayya when an explosive device planted in the vehicle was detonated. The terrorist group of Nusra Front claimed responsibility for the bombing.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Terrorist groups targeted the area surrounding the Municipal Palace in Aleppo city with more than 10 rocket shells on Saturday morning violating the cessation of hostilities agreement.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Seven civilians were injured in a terrorist rocket attack on al-Khalediya neighborhood in Aleppo city according to SANA. The attack caused also material damage to the citizens houses and properties.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A suicide terrorist driving a car packed with large quantities of explosives blew himself up at al-Hilaliyeh roundabout in central Qamishli city. Reports confirmed that five civilians were killed and many others were injured.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Ten civilians were killed and more than 50 others got injured in terrorist shelling of al-Sheikh Maqsoud neighborhood in Aleppo city in a new violation of the cessation of hostilities agreement.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Two civilians were killed on Monday as terrorists breached the cessation of hostilities agreement by targeting New Aleppo area in Aleppo city with a number of rocket shells.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
A terrorist car bomb rocked Masaken Barzeh neighborhood in Damascus city on Tuesday claiming eight and injuring 14 citizens according to Al-Manar reporter.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Seven civilians were martyred on Wednesday as Takfiri terrorists shelled Salah Eddin neighborhood in Aleppo city. Among the martyrs were a child and two women SANA news agency reported.
True
